for g in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    a = list(map(int, g.split()))
    n = len(a) - 1
    print(1, 2, n + 1) if a[0] + a[1] <= a[n] else print(-1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = input()
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = a[0] + a[1]
    if x > a[int(n) - 1]:
        print(-1)
    else:
        l = ['1', '2', n]
        y = ' '.join(l)
        print(y)

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sum = a[0] + a[1]
    print(f'1 2 {n}') if sum <= a[-1] else print(-1)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    c = 1
    if a[0] + a[1] <= a[n - 1]:
        print(1, 2, n)
        c = 0
    if c:
        print(-1)
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if arr[0] + arr[1] > arr[-1]:
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(1, 2, n)
